language.entry: %d additional Respite Points if you have at least one Abomination, Celestial, Hellion, or Leper in your party.
Just watch, this is nothing to me!
Bhavaagra's food is dull, but extremely potent.
Feel free to praise my efforts!
<A moment of freedom from worldly thoughts...>
<Pain is merely a suggestion. And I chose to ignore it.>
Where'd I stash this? Not telling ~

A thrill-seeking "delinquent", the Celestial has utmost confidence in her abilities. Her divine blade strikes unerringly to sunder body and spirit, while her command of the earth itself leaves formations dazed and shattered. Her roars of challenge are impossible to ignore - and any who anwser will be crushed by devastating counterattacks.

The Celestial's elegant dress, auspicious hat, and complacent gait conceal her true strength: a heaven-forged body more durable than any armor. Should a blow manage to harm her, complacency gives way to Exhilaration - demonstrating greater force and agility, but leaving herself vulnerable. Thankfully such elation fades swiftly, especially if her wounds are mended.

Every storm has its moments of calm. At camp the Celestial prepares to let loose again at dawn, calling upon ancient rituals to stabilize mind and body. She has a strong selfish streak, and will offer no charity to her companions - unless they massage her ego.
She may hail from Heaven, but there is no righteousness in her intent. Tread carefully.
"They warn of disaster, powerless to stop it."
​{colour_start|skill_unselectable}Only buffs the following classes: Celestial, Magician, Maid, Miko{colour_end}
{colour_start|attacktype}Friendly{colour_end} Skills: Self: {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} for each enemy {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(900%%){colour_end} 1 pts/rd for 3 rds

Drink to {colour_start|notable}set{colour_end} your {colour_start|attacktype}Spell Card{colour_end} limit to {colour_start|notable}3{colour_end}! {colour_start|skill_unselectable}Disclaimer: Has no effect on anyone but The Celestial.{colour_end}

{colour_start|notable}Increases{colour_end} your {colour_start|attacktype}Spell Card{colour_end} limit by {colour_start|notable}1{colour_end}! {colour_start|skill_unselectable}Disclaimer: Has no effect on anyone but The Celestial.{colour_end}
When you get to Hell, give them my regards!
A tempest of the heavens and earth!
And to think I went easy on you.
You thought you were strong? Fool.
Oh, did I forget to hold back?
I can't tell which is more shattered, your body or spirit.
That's what you get for disrespecting me.
You had guts. Emphasis on had.
Did I... hold back too much?
You'll find me tougher than that.
A little blood won't stop me!
The pain merely enhances my focus.
You expected me to writhe in pain?
You'll be fine, walk it off.
This is boring. Finish them already!
They fight harder in the dark? Good.
What horrors stalk beyond the dying flame?
Come out, come out, wherever you are...
Not all that glitters is gold.
Could you use your imagination a bit?
I knew you rabble were unreliable, and still I'm disappointed.
You rabble are weak, in body and spirit.
Vermin have more courage than you lot.
Why are you all so afraid?
Why did you bring me along again?
You know, I could make things more interesting... no?
Our enemy isn't trying very hard.
I wish something fun would happen.
If you can't take a hit, I'd recommend dodging.
Can't you fend for yourselves for once?
You can hold your own, at least.
You can hold your own, I'll give you that.
All thanks to my efforts, of course!
You all know who to thank for our fortune!
Huh, that one actually got me.
It'll take more than this to get rid of me.
You know, they could at least TRY to hurt me.
Compared to what I've been through, this is nothing.
Wake me if anything interesting happens.
I'm thinking of starting an incident. Anyone want in?
So close... I can feel it...
Go on. Push me further... see what happens...
The end is in sight... pity.
This has been almost TOO easy.
Remind me why I'm here again?
If you're just going to burden me, head back now.
Keep this up, and you're headed to an early grave.
I'm tired of carrying you sods.
If you want to die so badly, I could help.
Out of firewood, but at least that's less to carry.
No, my sword does NOT create fire.
I hear night sparrows taste excellent when grilled.
Was that the last of the tinned catfish? ...good riddance.
More interesting fare than back home, at least.
I don't even recognize half these provisions!
Abundant food and mediocre company... acceptable.
Mediocre food, but at least we have a lot of it.
So much wood! What do you say to a bonfire?
Stack the logs higher, we have plenty to spare.
This stone can absorb earthquakes. Wanna see?
This stone can absorb earthquakes. Wanna see?
You've earned the right to see my TRUE power!
Oh, how I've waited for this!
Oh, I'm not trapped in here with YOU. Heheh...
Do you enjoy scurrying about like a rat?
You call that a weapon? Hah!
Here, I'll make this easier for you.
Try not to miss this time.
Heaven has no place for cowards.
Mortals. So afraid for their lives.
Oho, a rat wants to play too?
I've been looking for a souvenir.
I've been looking for a souvenir.
Wow. Reminds me of that miko's shrine after I...
I hope you don't expect me to do carpentry.
What happened, an earthquake? I didn't do it.
So, what's here for me to fight?
I hear you have a demonic infestation?
I'm bored, gimme something to do.
I came here to fight, not laze about.
If you need a mountain razed, I can do that too.
It's like heaven here. Er, I didn't mean that in a good way.
The shrine collapsed? Wasn't me this time.
I haven't seen anything horrific enough.
I heard you had demons here, but all I've seen are pigs.
Fine, coop me up. See what happens.
A good rampage will clear my head.
Of all the horrors, THAT one was awfully ugly.
Why do I feel deja vu...
Could you show me the tavern instead?
What would I pray to? Myself?
I'll demolish it, if that's what you're asking.
You expect me to get drunk off this swill?
Another "on the rocks" joke, and I'm sending you to Hell.
Oi, ugly! Bet I can drink you under the table!
If I don't feel this one in the morning, you'll be sorry.
That's new, how do I play?
One chip. It's all I'll need to clean up tonight.
I'll wager this purse I can land a sto- what, you don't trust me?
I prefer to wager lives, but this will suffice.
This game seems a bit simple.
No, I don't want to see the men.
I hope you can satisfy me.
I'll try not to break the floor this time.
You know my flesh is toxic, right?
Get me out of this infernal cookpot!
Stop making jokes and get me out!
Why not? I've nothing better to do.
I was getting bored of them anyways.
Sorry. You're cute, but WAY too clingy.
Sorry, got a little carried away.
Rid me of this infernal anchor!
Ow! Fine, deal with the small one later!
Now why'd you have to remind me of that?
Very well - let us fall into Hell together!
Well, what are you waiting for?
Come at me, I don't have all day!
The torch? And why should I care?
Stop playing games. Your opponent's right here.
Do that again, and you'll see stars instead of torchlight.
The afterlife is harsh. Be safe.
Don't cry, I'm sending you next.
Just doing my job. Trust me, I don't like it either.
How dare you talk back to me!
Shut it, before I ram a Keystone into your backside!
Strike me down - if you can!
You've made a grave mistake underestimating me.
Be honored, I used a spellcard on you!
I'm impressed you didn't go flying.
The earth trembles, and the rats scatter!
Pffft. You call that a spellcard?
Trying to make them surrender out of pity?
(You need to slow down and relax.)
(Well, at least I won't have to wait.)
I could do that too. If I felt like it.
This isn't what it looks like, I swear.
Keep quiet about this, and I'll help you.
